name: Freebairn & Company
description: Freebairn & Co. is a full-service, integrated, marketing communications company. We serve a diverse portfolio of regional, national and international clients covering a wide range of industries. A Georgia corporation, located in Buckhead, we have been in business since 1980. As one of the top independent agencies in Atlanta and among the top 400 nationally, Freebairn & Co. generates capitalized billings of 20 million dollars annually.
